document.full_text: israel said on thursday a palestinian unity deal would sabotage prospects for peace and stemmed from panic by hamas and western-backed president mahmoud abbas over popular uprisings in syria and egypt.
document.title: surprise palestinian unity deal challenges israel
lines_and_colors: israel said on thursday a palestinian unity deal would sabotage prospects for peace and stemmed from panic by hamas and western-backed president mahmoud abbas over popular uprisings in syria and egypt.
